dataIdInfo.idAbs: Contract Service Areas for water contracts in the Lower Colorado Region. This database was developed based on the exisitng water contracts between Reclamation and the individual water users on the River. The Service Areas of PPR are also included in this database.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Bureau of Reclamation water contract service areas for the Lower Colorado Region. Shows the areas within Nevada, California and Arizona where water from the Colorado River can be used for various purposes.

LegConsts.useLimit: Do not Distribute without the permission of the Bureau of Reclamation

Consts.useLimit: These data should not be distributed to users unless distribution is explicitly granted. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the most recent copy of both data and metadata. Acknowledgement of BOR would be appreciated.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

report.measDesc: Features represented have not been tested for completeness

enttyp.enttypd: Wate Contract Service Areas Lower Colorado Region

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Primary unique Identifer for the dataset
